knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# Creating the environment

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(extractr)
library(here)
library(pdftools)
```

# Getting data 

```{r}
pdfs <- list.files(here("data/pdfs"))

wos_txt <- 
  pdf_text(pdf = here("data/pdfs", pdfs[2])) |> 
  read_lines() %>% 
  tibble() %>% 
  rename(doc_line = ".") %>% 
  mutate(lines = 1:length(doc_line))
```
